values.comment: Recommendations are those requirements that “should” be met but for which non-compliance is not a matter of exclusion or sanction
Requirements for immediate action indicate that compliance must be met immediately; otherwise applicants are excluded from the certification/verification process
Requirements to be met within one year (Short-term) requirements: indicate that compliance must be met in less than 12 months
values.value: Requirements to be met within 1 year

values.comment: Requirements to be met within three year (Mid-term) requirements: indicate that compliance must be met in less than 36 months
values.value: Requirements to be met within 3 years

values.comment: Requirements to be met within 5 year (Long-term) requirements: indicate that compliance must be met in a period of time that is defined as more than 36 months
values.value: Requirements to be met within 5 years

referencedBy.comment: The degree of obligation refers to the timeframe of implementation of a given requirement.
